summary:
Halo is a popular video game series and franchise, starting with the game *Halo: Combat Evolved* in 2001. It was created by Bungie and is now owned by Microsoft's Halo Studios. The games are set in a sci-fi world where players fight against enemies as a soldier named Master Chief.

The first Halo game was a big success, making the Xbox console very popular. Over time, the series has sold millions of copies and made a lot of money, with many games, books, and movies. The latest game, *Halo Infinite*, came out in 2021.
title: Halo (franchise)
